title: AR-Based Project Learning Course in Engineering Mechanics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Environment Enabling Digital Device (Tablet/AR Headset) Utilization; Requires Team-Based Project Spaces

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the three core principles of engineering mechanics (statics, dynamics, materials mechanics) with over 85% accuracy via AR simulation.
Learners can complete the process of solving real-world engineering problems (structural design/analysis) using AR tools in team projects with 100% success.
Learners can improve conceptual understanding by 20% by reviewing learning content at least three times through an AR-based self-assessment system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
